thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Realpage Reports Q1 EPS $0.13

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Realpage Reports Q1 EPS $0.13
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - RealPage Inc:
* REALPAGE REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE $201.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $201.1 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.46 TO $1.51
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37 TO $0.38
* RAISES FULL YEAR GUIDANCE * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.35, REVENUE VIEW $208.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.44, REVENUE VIEW $844.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
Our
